Verses: 1 agasiyaa Ennum Yoodhaavudaiya Raajaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaasudaiya Irubaththumoondraam Varushaththil Yegoovin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaagaas Isravelinmel Samaariyaavile Padhinezhuvarusham Raajyabaarampanni,
2 karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhu, Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Paavangalaip Pin Patri Nadandhaan; Avaigalai Vittu Avan Vilagavillai.
3 aagaiyaal Karththarukku Isravelinmel Kobamoondu, Avargalai Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagelin Kaiyilum Aasagelin Kumaaranaagiya Penaadhaaththin Kaiyilum Annaatkalilellaam Oppukkoduththaar.
4 yovaagaas Karththarudaiya Samugaththai Nokkip Praarththiththaan; Seeriyaavin Raajaa Isravelai Odukkugiradhinaal Avargal Odungippogiradhaip Paarththu:karththar Avanukku Sevikoduththaar.
5 karththar Isravelukku Oru Ratchaganaik Koduththadhinaal, Avargal Seeriyarudaiya Kaiyinkeezhirundhu Neengalaanaargal; Aadhalaal Isravel Puththirar Munpol Thangal Koodaarangalile Kudiyirundhaargal.
6 aagilum Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Yerobeyaam Veettaarin Paavangalai Avargal Vittu Vilagaamal Adhile Nadandhaargal; Samaariyaavilirundha Vikkiragaththoppum Nilaiyaayirundhadhu.

7 yovaagaasukku Seeriyaavin Raajaa, Aimbadhu Kudhiraiveeraraiyum, Paththu Radhangalaiyum, Padhinaayiram Kaalaatkalaiyume Allaamal, Janangalil Verondrum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkavillai; Avan Avargalai Azhiththup Poradikkum Idaththuth Thoolaippola Aakkippottaan.
8 yovaagaasin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Avanudaiya Vallamaiyum Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
9 yovaagaas Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Avanai Samaariyaavile Adakkampanninaargal; Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yovaas Avan Sthaanaththil Raajaavaanaan.
10 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yovaasudaiya Muppaththezhaam Varushaththil Yovaagaasin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaas, Isravelinmel Raajaavaagiya Samaariyaavile Padhinaaruvarusham Raajyabaaram Panni,
11 karththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan; Isravelaip Paavancheyyappannina Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Paavangalai Vittu Vilagaamal Avaigalilellaam Nadandhaan.

12 yovaasin Matra Varththamaanangalum, Avan Seydhavai Yaavum, Avan Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Amadhsiyaavodu Avan Yuththampannina Vallamaiyum, Isravel Raajaakkalin Naalaagamap Pusthagaththil Allavo Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
13 yovaas Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhapin, Yerobeyaam Avan Singaasanaththil Veetrirundhaan; Yovaas Samaariyaavil Isravelin Raajaakkalandaiyile Adakkampannappattaan.

14 avan Naatkalil Elisaa Maranaththukku Edhuvaana Vyaadhiyaaik Kidandhaan; Appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaas Avanidaththukkup Poi, Avanmel Vizhundhu, Azhudhu: En Thagappane, En Thagappane, Isravelukku Radhamum Kudhiraiveerarumaayirundhavare Endraan.
15 elisaa Avanaip Paarththu: Villaiyum Ambugalaiyum Pidiyum Endraan; Appadiye Villaiyum Ambugalaiyum Pidiththukkondaan.
16 appozhudhu Avan Isravelin Raajaavai Nokki: Ummudaiya Kaiyai Villinmel Vaiyum Endraan; Avan Than Kaiyai Vaiththapodhu, Elisaa Than Kaigalai Raajaavudaiya Kaigalmel Vaiththu:

17 kizhakke Irukkira Jannalaith Thiravum Endraan; Avan Adhaith Thirandha Podhu, Elisaa: Eyyum Endraan; Ivan Eydhapodhu, Avan: Adhu Karththarudaiya Ratchippin Ambum, Seeriyarinindru Vidudhalaiyaakkum Ratchippin Ambumaanadhu; Neer Aappekkile Seeriyaraith Theera Muriya Adippeer Endraan.
18 pinbu Ambugalaip Pidiyum Endraan; Avaigalaip Pidiththaan. Appozhudhu Avan Isravelin Raajaavai Nokki: Tharaiyile Adiyum Endraan; Avan Moondrudharam Adiththu Nindraan.

19 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Manushan Avanmel Kobamaagi: Neer Aindhu Aaruvisai Adiththeeraanaal, Appozhudhu Seeriyaraith Theera Muriya Adippeer; Ippozhudho Seeriyarai Moondruvisaimaaththiram Muriya Adippeer Endraan.
20 elisaa Maranamadaindhaan; Avanai Adakkampanninaargal; Maruvarushaththile Movaabiyarin Thandugal Dhesaththile Vandhadhu.

21 appozhudhu Avargal, Oru Manushanai Adakkampannappogaiyil, Andhath Thandaik Kandu, Andha Manushanai Elisaavin Kallaraiyil Pottaargal; Andha Manushanin Predham Adhile Vizhundhu Elisaavin Elumbugalinmel Pattapodhu, Andha Manushan Uyiradaindhu Than Kaalgalai Oondri Ezhundhirundhaan.
22 yovaagaasin Naatkalilellaam Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagel Isravelai Odukkinaan.

23 aanaalum Karththar Avargalukku Irangi, Aabragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargalodu Seydha Thamadhu Udanpadikkaiyinimiththam Avargalai Azhikka Siththamaayiraamalum, Avargalai Innum Thammudaiya Mugaththaivittuth Thallaamalum Avargalmel Manadhurugi, Avargalai Ninaiththarulinaar.
24 seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagel Irandhupoi, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Penaadhaadh Avan Sthaanaththile Raajaavaana Pinbu,

25 yovaagaasin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaas, Aasagelode Yuththampanni, Than Thagappanaagiya Yovaagaasin Kaiyilirundhu Pidiththukkonda Pattanangalai Avan Kumaaranaagiya Penaadhaaththin Kaiyilirundhu Thirumbap Pidiththuk Kondaan; Moondruvisai Yovaas Avanai Muriya Adiththu Isravelin Pattanangalaith Thirumbak Kattikkondaan.
